text: Big thank you Dr Charles Tan for removing my third lipoma. I am so happy now. It is healing so well and the post operation site looks great. I am extremely grateful to you for helping me.  Always a joy to go to Dr Tan's clinic as he is always so cheerful and positive.
had a cyst remove at the clinic. Dr Charles is very professional and as good as it gets. Highly recommended.

Dr Charles Tan was recommended to me by my endocrine doctor because of my thyroid. He is a direct and frank surgeon who gave me confident to go through the op. He will answer all queries n never hesitate to give assurance that most patients need. A sincere thanks.

Professional, kind & experience Dr Charles. I'm very happy with the service. Lucky we found him. Would recommend others to him
Thumbs up
He is the best :) Thank you Dr Charles !
